comments.body: `pkg/volume/fc/fc_util.go` defines `ioHandler` which does essentially the same thing. Could you consolidate that with this.

My problem is I don't have any access to FC which means I can't test any changes
Can I do a follow-up pull request which can be tested separately?
if that's the way to go, please make sure opening an issue to track it.

> Can I do a follow-up pull request which can be tested separately?

Yes. Just create a bug to follow up and put a TODO comment with the issue # here saying that this code is duplicate and it should be consolidated with `ioHandler` defined in `pkg/volume/fc/fc_util.go`.
